org.dockbox.selene.server.minecraft.players.inventory

Class PlayerInventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dockbox.selene.server.minecraft.players.inventory.PlayerInventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexedInventory, Inventory, PositionInventory, SlotInventory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpongePlayerInventory

    public abstract class PlayerInventory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IndexedInventory, PositionInventory, SlotInventory
    Represents a single player's inventory. This is built up of: - 4 rows, of which one is the hotbar - 4 equipment slots - 2 hand slots (off- and main-hand)

    Index- and row/column-based lookups only support the grid inventory, starting at the top left corner: Inventory:

    0 - - - - - - 8 9 - - - - - - 17 18 - - - - - - 26

    Hotbar: 27 - - - - - - 35

    Equipment lookups should be performed using SlotInventory.getSlot(Slot).

      • getRow

        public abstract Exceptional<InventoryRow> getRow(int index)
        Gets a specific row within the inventory. If the index is out of bounds, Exceptional.none() is returned.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the row.
        Returns:
        The row, or none.
